Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute at Cermak/Archer
ShortDescription: 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Archer, Canal and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Archer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Archer, Canal and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Archer.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/Cortland
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Narragansett/Cortland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Narragansett, Grand, Central, North Avenue, Ridgeland, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Narragansett/Cortland.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Westbound #55 Garfield Reroute near Garfield/Princeton
ShortDescription: Westbound 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted near Garfield/Princeton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via Garfield, Princeton, 51st, Halsted, Garfield and resume to normal route, due to street blockage near Garfield/Princeton.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Garfield
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Garfield due to a sick customer.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Garfield due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
